category: Management group operation regulations/Article 7 (Functions of the committee)
contents: Article 7 (Functions of the Committee) ① The Committee shall take charge of and handle the following matters of member organizations designated as management organizations. Revised 2021. 10. 6. 1. Matters pertaining to the functions of the General Assembly of Representatives 2. Matters pertaining to the functions of the Board of Directors 3. Matters pertaining to legislation and rewards and punishments 4. Matters pertaining to the execution of affairs by the Secretariat 5. Provisions in the Articles of Association (or Bylaws) of the member organizations ② If necessary for the normalization of the relevant management organization, the Committee may adjust matters such as holding a general meeting of representatives and appointment of executives of the relevant organization by resolution of the Committee. Revised 2021. 10. 6.
